com.maraudersapp.android.drawer

Class DrawerView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.maraudersapp.android.drawer.DrawerView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.mikepenz.materialdrawer.Drawer.OnDrawerItemClickListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FriendsDrawerView, GroupsDrawerView, MainDrawerView, SettingsDrawerView

    public abstract class DrawerView
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.mikepenz.materialdrawer.Drawer.OnDrawerItemClickListener
    Created by Michael on 10/27/2015. This abstract class is the view for the menu drawer displayed on the right side
